name: Randoms
description: Checks if the given {@param target} is less than or equal to a random value between 0(inclusive) and 100 (exclusive)

methods.name: random
methods.description: Returns a number between 0 (inclusive) and high (exclusive)

methods.name: nextLogNormalDistributionRandom
methods.signature: public static double nextLogNormalDistributionRandom​(double scale, double shape) throws org.apache.commons.math3.exception.NotStrictlyPositiveException
methods.description: Generates a lognormal distribution using the provided parameters with an inverse absolute accuracy of 1e-9 and uses a Well19937c number generator to return a sample

methods.name: nextGaussianRandom
methods.signature: public static double nextGaussianRandom​(double mean, double sigma)
methods.description: Generates a random value from the Normal (or Gaussian) distribution with specified mean and standard deviation.

methods.name: nextHypergeometricRandom
methods.signature: public static double nextHypergeometricRandom​(int populationSize, int numberOfSuccesses, int sampleSize)
methods.description: Generates a random value from the HypergeometricDistribution.

methods.name: nextGammaRandom
methods.signature: public static double nextGammaRandom​(int shape, int scale)
methods.description: Generates a random value from the GammaDistribution

methods.name: chance
methods.signature: public static boolean chance​(int target, int overall)
methods.description: Checks if the given {@param target} is less than or equal to a random value between 0(inclusive) and {@param overall}(exclusive) Method just returns Calculations.random(overall) <= target

methods.name: getSeededInt
methods.signature: public static int getSeededInt​(java.lang.String seed, int min, int max)

methods.name: getSeededDouble
methods.signature: public static double getSeededDouble​(java.lang.String seed, double min, double max)
